## CameraHistoryData type

Temporal history resources used by reprojection (TAA, motion blur).

**Signature:**

```typescript
type CameraHistoryData = {
    prevColorTex: BaseTexture;
    prevMotionVectorTex: BaseTexture;
};
```
**References:** [BaseTexture](doc/markdown/./device.basetexture.md)
